about_the_game:
A POST-APOCALYPTIC ROGUELIKE SURVIVAL

Step into the blood-soaked ruins of civilization in The Last Days, a relentless top-down shooter that plunges you into the heart of a brutal post-apocalyptic world. Inspired by the action roguelike genre, this game delivers an intense, ever-evolving battlefield where survival is measured in seconds, and danger lurks at every turn.

FACE THE ENDLESS NIGHTMARE

Humanity is destroyed. A deadly virus has escaped from the depths of a secret laboratory. City after city, country after country has fallen. You are one of the few survivors in this new reality full of mutated monsters.

Immerse yourself in a world devastated by a a terrifying zombie apocalypse. You must navigate through various environments, including abandoned towns and high-security laboratories, to uncover the secrets behind the outbreak.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Merciless horde combat: Engage in fast-paced battles against unrelenting swarms of mutants, zombies, and nightmarish abominations. Their numbers grow, their strength increases, and hesitation means death.

  • Top-down shooter gameplay: Enjoy a strategic view of the battlefield as you fend off relentless waves of zombies.

  • Extensive deadly arsenal: Choose from a wide range of melee weapons, firearms and items to make your own playstyle. Unlock and upgrade your gear to create unstoppable builds.

  • Squad of characters: Unlock new survivors with special features to change the gameplay and get an another experience.

  • Fascinating lore: Find out the origin of the occurred disaster through the notes of survivors... or deads...

  • Diverse environments: Explore different locations, each full of unique dangers and hiding a dramatic story.

  • Breathtaking horror experience: Plunge into a chilling atmosphere, enhanced by haunting visuals and sound effects.

WILL YOU SURVIVE?

The apocalypse has no mercy. The weak perish, the strong endure — but for how long? Take up arms, face the hordes, and prove that you have what it takes to survive the hellish descent into humanity’s final days.

No second chances. No safe zones. Just blood, steel, and the unrelenting struggle for survival.

Prepare yourself. The Last Days have begun...

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: Fight for your life in the exciting top-down zombie shooter! Explore locations and their stories, kill various zombies, and make a unique playstyle with a wide amount of weapons and items. Get an immersive experience of horror and action, trying to survive. The Last Days of your life begin now...
